channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: More flytipping, 27th June
item.description:
Sorry but more Flytipping outside Mind shop, no doubt in the name of ‘donations’. Perhaps a sign saying the area is being watched by camera might deter people from doing this? They know it is wrong yet convince themselves it isn’t illegal dumping.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Faversham Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Food wrappers are scattered around.Florence road, 27th June
item.description:
Almost every day, cars stop, people eat in their cars, throw out their trash, and drive away — and at night, foxes keep me awake because of it. As a result, a fox constantly roams under our windows looking for food, since people keep throwing food out on the road. I have never seen our street being cleaned. We pay so much in council tax, yet no cleaning service is provided.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Florence Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Food waste on pavement attracting flies, 27th June
item.description:
The bin bag waste has overflowed again, as it does every single week, and has been ripped apart on the pavement. There. Is food waste rotting and flies are everywhere.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Almond Close, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Saving road space, 27th June
item.description:
The occupant of number 23 is reserving road space outside the property each time she drives away. Parking is hard for everyone in this road. When returning home with shopping to unload or even just park, it is not fair that residents are unable to use this spot. Please could she be informed that this is not allowed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Halons Road, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
